message.content:
Sure, here is a healthy meal plan without the mentioned ingredients:

Breakfast:
- Scrambled tofu with spinach and tomatoes, served with whole grain toast.
- Fruit salad made from your favorite fruits, exclude bananas if you have a sensitivity to them.

Lunch:
- Quinoa salad with chickpeas, cucumber, bell peppers, olives, and fresh herbs like parsley or cilantro. Dress it with lemon juice and olive oil.
- Side of steamed broccoli seasoned with salt and pepper.

Dinner:
- Baked salmon with a simple seasoning of sea salt, black pepper, and dried oregano. Serve with brown rice and sautéed kale.
- Finish the meal with a cup of herbal tea, avoiding any that contain honey or other sweeteners.

Remember to stay hydrated throughout the day by drinking plenty of water and unsweetened herbal teas. Also, consider incorporating some form of physical activity into your daily routine to maintain good health. Enjoy your meals!
